name: TATO: A ghost seeking for death
name_original: TATO: A ghost seeking for death
description:
TATO: A ghost seeking for death

Tato has been a ghost for a long time, he got tired of being one. He wants to be the ghost of a ghost, if that makes sense... 

Will he find his seeked goal? 

We shall see, because he is as unlucky in death than he was in life.

HOW TO INSTALL:
Unzip and run

Project submitted to Weekly Game Jam - Week 130
